Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-0994 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.45-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-0994 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.45-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package mysql is earlier than 8.0.45-2, affected by CVE-2026-0994
